math/

jbbilateralfilter.pro


top source jbbilateralfilter

Math

result = jbbilateralfilter(image, sigma_space, sigma_range)

Implements the bilateral filter on an image.

Uses the Paris & Durand (2006) algorithm. Note that there is heavy memory optimization because the application it was written for runs it on extremely large images.

Parameters

image in

2D array to be filtered.

sigma_space in

Gaussian width in the spatial dimensions.

sigma_range in

Gaussian width in the intensity dimension.

Author information

History:

Original release by Jeremy Bailin, 3 Dec 2012 Bug fixes (floating point locations for trilinear interpolation, /edge_zero instead of /edge_truncate) and improved documentation 4 Dec 2012 Added lots of TEMPORARY and SHRINKINTTYPE calls to improve memory usage 6 Dec 2012
